languages.text: {n}Громкий вздох, взмах огненного хвоста — и Ирлиэт покидает ваши покои, не сказав больше ни слова.{/n}
{n}A loud sigh, a wave of her fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying another word.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Громкий вздох, взмах огненного хвоста — и Ирлиэт покидает ваши покои, не сказав больше ни слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A loud sigh, a wave of the fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying a single word.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A loud sigh, a wave of her fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying another word.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}随着一声沉重的叹息，你看到火红的辫子从你面前一闪而过。伊莉耶特没有再说什么，转身离开了你的房间。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A loud sigh, a wave of her fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying another word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}随着一声沉重的叹息，你看到火红的辫子从你面前一闪而过。伊莉耶特没有再说什么，转身离开了你的房间。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con un fuerte suspiro y un coletazo de su fogosa melena, Yrliet se marcha de tu habitación sin pronunciar otra palabra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A loud sigh, a wave of her fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying another word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un fuerte suspiro y un coletazo de su fogosa melena, Yrliet se marcha de tu habitación sin pronunciar otra palabra.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet laisse échapper un soupir, et sa queue de cheval rousse fouette l'air tandis qu'elle sort de vos appartements sans ajouter un mot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A loud sigh, a wave of her fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying another word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet laisse échapper un soupir, et sa queue de cheval rousse fouette l'air tandis qu'elle sort de vos appartements sans ajouter un mot.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein lautes Seufzen, ein Winken ihres feurigen Ponyschwanzes – und Yrliet verlässt dein Zimmer ohne ein weiteres Wort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A loud sigh, a wave of her fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying another word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein lautes Seufzen, ein Winken ihres feurigen Ponyschwanzes – und Yrliet verlässt dein Zimmer ohne ein weiteres Wort.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}大きなため息をつくと、ユリエットはそれ以上何も言わず、燃えるような色のポニーテールを揺らしながら部屋を出て行った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A loud sigh, a wave of her fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying another word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}大きなため息をつくと、ユリエットはそれ以上何も言わず、燃えるような色のポニーテールを揺らしながら部屋を出て行った。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sesli bir şekilde iç çekip alev rengi at kuyruğu saçlarını sallayan Yrliet, tek kelime daha etmeden odadan ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A loud sigh, a wave of her fiery ponytail — and Yrliet leaves your room without saying another word.{/n}
